metadata.title: CVE-2017-8798 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Integer signedness error in MiniUPnP MiniUPnPc v1.4.20101221 through v2.0allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service or possibly haveunspecified other impact.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8798` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libminiupnpc10 - 1.9.20140610-2ubuntu2.16.04.1
miniupnpc - 1.9.20140610-2ubuntu2.16.04.1
python-miniupnpc - 1.9.20140610-2ubuntu2.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: miniupnpc package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.9.20140610-2ubuntu2.16.04.1').
